title: Death of Yasin Malik’s mother-in-law widely condoled in IIOJK
content:
ISLAMABAD, Jan 17 (APP):Hurriyat parties and leaders have expressed their profound grief and sorrow over the sad demise of Rehana Hussein Mullick, the mother-in-law of illegally detained Jammu and Kashmir Liberation Front Chairman Muhammad Yasin Malik.
Jammu and Kashmir Liberation Front, Tehreek-e-Hurriyat Jammu and Kashmir, Jammu and Kashmir Muslim League Democratic Freedom Party and other parties and leaders in their separate statements in Srinagar extended heartfelt condolences to the bereaved family.
They, while referring to Mullick family’s significant contribution to Kashmir cause, said that the family had made unparalleled sacrifices for the Kashmir freedom movement.
Expressing heartfelt sympathies to Ms Mushaal Mullick and other family members, they prayed to Allah Almighty to rest the departed soul in eternal peace and grant courage to the bereaved to bear the irreparable loss with fortitude.
